document.full_text: increasing consumer anxiety that prices are broadly on the rise should not trigger an inflation-fighting response from the u.s. federal reserve, according to research monday from the san francisco fed.
document.title: consumer inflation fears up? not a worry, sf fed says
lines_and_colors: increasing consumer anxiety that prices are broadly on the rise should not trigger an inflation-fighting response from the u.s. federal reserve, according to research monday from the san francisco fed.
